---
name: sf:document
description: Auto-generate documentation for Apex classes, LWC components, and Flows
arguments:
  - name: target
    description: File or directory to document
    required: false
---

# Salesforce Document Command

Generates comprehensive documentation for Salesforce components.

## Workflow

### For Apex Classes
```apex
/**
 * @description Service class for Account-related business operations
 * @author Generated by sf:document
 * @date 2024-01-15
 * @group Account Services
 */
public with sharing class AccountService {
    
    /**
     * @description Processes accounts and updates their status
     * @param accounts List of accounts to process
     * @return List of processed account IDs
     * @throws AccountProcessingException if validation fails
     * @example
     * List<Account> accounts = [SELECT Id FROM Account LIMIT 10];
     * List<Id> processedIds = AccountService.processAccounts(accounts);
     */
    public static List<Id> processAccounts(List<Account> accounts) {
        // Implementation
    }
}
```

### For LWC Components
```markdown
# accountCard Component

## Description
Displays account information in a card format with edit capabilities.

## Properties
| Name | Type | Required | Description |
|------|------|----------|-------------|
| recordId | String | Yes | Account record ID |
| variant | String | No | Card style (default, compact) |

## Events
| Name | Detail | Description |
|------|--------|-------------|
| save | {accountId} | Fired when save completes |
| cancel | - | Fired when user cancels |

## Usage
```html
<c-account-card 
    record-id={accountId}
    onsave={handleSave}>
</c-account-card>
```
```

### For Flows
```markdown
# Lead_Assignment_Flow

## Description
Automatically assigns leads to sales reps based on territory and criteria.

## Entry Criteria
- Triggered on Lead creation
- Runs when Status = 'New'

## Flow Steps
1. Get Lead Owner's Territory
2. Find Available Sales Rep
3. Assign Lead to Rep
4. Send Notification Email

## Exit Points
- Success: Lead assigned
- No Rep Available: Assign to queue
```
